name: Strung Together (NomBinary)
description:
Strung Together

Play as the red string of fate and pair the right people together!

Use either WASD and the arrow keys to move the string around, or if you're using a controller, use the right and left joystick to move the string.  Use the clues to figure out who to pair up with who. Tie yourself around both of the right angles to complete the level!

Team: No Strings Attached

Team Members:

Hanna Aref, Jean Carnesecchi, Jiahe Xing, Nom Köhler, Teodor Ragnemalm

Chosen themes: Retell a tale
